ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Account.Name == null, !ISPICKVAL( Status, 'New'), Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'Express Returns',Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'Missed Call Queue', Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'IT related Queue',Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'Facilities Queue', Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'Feedback Queue', Owner:Queue.QueueName != 'DriverApp Feedback' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add the name of the Account before proceeding to the next case stage. Status cannot be anything other than 'New' unless you enter the Account Name.
